metadata.title: CVE-2024-38545 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/hns: Fix UAF for cq async eventThe refcount of CQ is not protected by locks. When CQ asynchronousevents and CQ destruction are concurrent, CQ may have been released,which will cause UAF.Use the xa_lock() to protect the CQ refcount.
